text: 届く［荷物が～］;とどきます［にもつが～］;todokimasu [nimotsu ga~];[parcels] be delivered

軟らかい;やわらかい;yawarakai;soft, tender
剣道;けんどう;kendou;kendo (Japanese sword fighting)

必ず;かならず;kanarazu;without fail, by all means
絶対に;ぜったいにzettaini;;absolutely (used with negatives)

出来るだけ;できるだけ;dekirudake;as much as possible
そのほうが～;そのほうが～;sonohouga~;That is more~
お客様;おきゃくさま;okyakusama;guest, customer
